snippet: KALEKO--Ruth, 93. Beloved wife of the late Robert (Bob). Loving mother of Lauren and Martin Kaminsky, and the late Scott. Fabulous grandmother of Todd and his wife Ellen, Scott and his wife Jennifer. Adored GiGi of Scarlett, Jade, Mick and Rafe. Ruth was an integral part of the Long Beach community, where she taught school for many years. She served on the school board and zoning board, as well as being in many organizations. Ruth was a devoted aunt and friend. The funeral is to be held at Temple Emanu-El, Neptune Blvd., Long Beach, NY on Thursday at 9:30am. Shiva will be held at Ruth's house through Sunday. Donations can be sent to: Kaleko Memorial Scholarship Fund, 302 Blackhealth Road, Lido Beach, NY 11561. 1/3
